fileSamples.statement:
(s : list stackframe) (fb : block) (f : Mach.function) (rs1 : preg -> val) (i : Mach.instruction) (c : list Mach.instruction) (ep : bool) (tf : function) (tc : code) (m1' m2 m2' : mem) (sp : val) (ms2 : Mach.regset) (H : match_stack ge s) (H0 : Mem.extends m2 m2') (H1 : Genv.find_funct_ptr ge fb = Some (Internal f)) (H2 : transl_code_at_pc ge (rs1 PC) fb f (i :: c) ep tf tc) (H3 : forall k c0 : code,
transl_instr f i ep k = OK c0 ->
exists rs2 : regset,
  exec_straight tge tf c0 rs1 m1' k rs2 m2' /\
  agree ms2 sp rs2 /\ (it1_is_parent ep i = true -> rs2 X30 = parent_sp s)) : exists st' : state,
  plus step tge (State rs1 m1') E0 st' /\
  match_states (Mach.State s fb sp c ms2 m2) st'.
fileSamples.conclusion:
exists st' : state,
  plus step tge (State rs1 m1') E0 st' /\
  match_states (Mach.State s fb sp c ms2 m2) st'
fileSamples.hypotheses:
(s : list stackframe) (fb : block) (f : Mach.function) (rs1 : preg -> val) (i : Mach.instruction) (c : list Mach.instruction) (ep : bool) (tf : function) (tc : code) (m1' m2 m2' : mem) (sp : val) (ms2 : Mach.regset) (H : match_stack ge s) (H0 : Mem.extends m2 m2') (H1 : Genv.find_funct_ptr ge fb = Some (Internal f)) (H2 : transl_code_at_pc ge (rs1 PC) fb f (i :: c) ep tf tc) (H3 : forall k c0 : code,
transl_instr f i ep k = OK c0 ->
exists rs2 : regset,
  exec_straight tge tf c0 rs1 m1' k rs2 m2' /\
  agree ms2 sp rs2 /\ (it1_is_parent ep i = true -> rs2 X30 = parent_sp s))
fileSamples.proofString:
inversion H2.
subst.
monadInv H7.
exploit H3; eauto.
intros [rs2 [A [B C]]].
exists (State rs2 m2'); split.
eapply exec_straight_exec; eauto.
econstructor; eauto.
eapply exec_straight_at; eauto.
